[character][0x1]...
Dragnar.
You have done well to come this far.
Hesitate not.
Now... Open the door, and come to me.[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Matelite... From here on it will be dangerous... The Holy Dragon is full of hatred. I don't know whether I will be able to stop it or not...[end]P
Please... Jormungand. Close the door... It is me that you want... Forgive [character][0x1] and the others...[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]... This won't do! Please wait for me![end]S
Sendak: [character][0x1]... I... the truth is... I would like it if you could carry me... I would appreciate it if you could rub my legs... I want you to help me... But, the princess...[end]T

Taicho: [character][0x1]... She is acting differently than her usual self!
[character][0x1]... You must do something![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Stop... [character][0x1]. I will go ahead alone...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... please. Until the very end, please watch over me...[end]

Your friends... They watch out for you and they support you... They do not betray you... Nor do they suffer your pain...
Long ago... We Holy Dragons too were once as you are.[end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: Jormungand... I am ready. Whatever you have to say...
I am prepared to accept you.[end]

Listen well...
The beginning of it all was a very long time ago...
Our hatred... Our sadness... Our anger... Our every thought... Our irreversible past... The War of the Holy Dragons...[end]

Human... Listen...
Very long ago... we Holy Dragons fought.
We felt hatred... we were twisted... we were cursed... All of the emptiness there was lost... All that remained was our minds... The minds of we Holy Dragons...
The door to the new era... When it is opened...
We shall be despised.
That time is soon at hand...[end][end]
